rooms.description: Open space with integrated seating and dining area, featuring Art Deco style detailing and ample natural light from large windows. Designed to be welcoming and functional.
Spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed with clean lines and elegant Art Deco accents ensuring privacy and comfort.
Cozy guest room located adjacent to the servant's quarters for convenience. Includes built-in storage solutions.
Compact yet comfortable living space for domestic help, featuring basic amenities and a small private bathroom.
A quiet study area designed with built-in shelves and seating, emphasizing natural light and ventilation to foster creativity and learning.

openings.description: Grand entrance door with Art Deco detailing designed for easy access and natural ventilation.
Large windows to maximize daylight and ensure proper cross-ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Balcony offering a view of the surroundings, designed to enhance the spatial experience and provide additional ventilation.
